survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Autonomous Library Checkout Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from library patrons regarding their experience using autonomous checkout systems to improve service efficiency and user satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the autonomous checkout systems at this library?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the autonomous checkout systems at this library?

questions.question_text: What do you find most convenient about the autonomous checkout system?
answer_options: No need to wait in line
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all conveniences experienced by users. Include an 'Other' option for unique responses.

script.question_text: What do you find most convenient about the autonomous checkout system?
answer_options: No need to wait in line
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using the autonomous checkout system?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Multiple selections allowed to identify common challenges. 'Other' option for additional feedback.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using the autonomous checkout system?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the autonomous checkout system overall?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Single-choice format.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the autonomous checkout system overall?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the autonomous checkout system?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the autonomous checkout system?
